attributes.action: allow me to remain a European, despite my British passport and the referendum
attributes.additional_details: Petition set up by Shona Fraser
attributes.background: Why should the decision of such a small majority change the identity of a whole generation.

rejection.details:
If by "European" you mean "citizen of the EU", you might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133603
